txt.en:
[placeholder],

If this letter finds anyone, then may they come to the Trollshaws and find a makeshift camp I am sharing with an uppity Elf! All this because one of our number got lost as we made our way to the east.

The camp is located to the south-east of the Last Bridge, nestled upon a rise surrounded by smooth stones.

Heithur Ironfist

'I'll be wary of you for a while, for certain, but it seems you did find my letter and come to help. If you are looking to earn a bit of trust, talk to the Elf.

'I may not care too much for them, but this one is starting to grow on me the longer I am here with him.

'Oh...thank you for coming.'
You discovered a letter penned by a dwarf who said that he was separated from a friend in the wilds of the Trollshaws.
Talk to Heithur Ironfist in the Trollshaws

The camp written about in the message is located south-east of the Last Bridge a short distance off of the road. You will see the hills rise sharply and a small cliff surrounded by pillar-like stones. Heithur must be there.\n\nA dwarf, Heithur Ironfist, sent a message to any soul who would come to his aid in the Trollshaws.
